title: Best of The Herd: 11/21/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/21/2018
description:
Colin says that Thanksgiving should start early in Cleveland and all of the Cavs fans should thank LeBron during his return for giving them what he did over the years. He doesn't think the Cowboys have a sustainable system for success in the NFL. Plus, FOX College Football Analyst Joel Klatt comes in studio to talk Ohio State vs Michigan and argue with Colin about his criteria for the College Football Playoff. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
